女性を困惑させ、強引に修理「瓦が持ち上がった」…台風被害住宅

01 Nov 2019, 02:57

　台風１５号の強風で被害を受けた高齢女性宅の屋根を強引に修理したとして、千葉県警は３１日、東京都渋谷区の家屋診断・修理会社の社長（２６）（東京都江戸川区）を特定商取引法違反（威迫困惑）の疑いで逮捕した。
　発表によると、社長は仲間と共謀し、台風１５号が上陸した翌日の９月１０日、千葉市の７０歳代女性の自宅を訪れ、「瓦が持ち上がって直さなきゃいけない」などと言って女性を困惑させ、屋根を修理した疑い。女性は２５万円を請求され、その場で支払ったという。
　県警は９月、同社従業員の男（２７）を同容疑で逮捕。社長の関与が浮上し、指名手配して行方を追い、静岡県内の宿泊施設で見つけた。
　県警には２９日までに、家屋修理などを巡る被害相談が約１６０件寄せられた。県警は、同社が関わった事案もあるとみて調べている。

Troubled woman, forcibly repaired "tile raised" ... Typhoon damaged house

01 Nov 2019, 02:57

Chiba Prefectural Police said the president (26) of a house diagnosis and repair company (Shibuya-ku, Tokyo) (Edogawa-ku, Tokyo) on the 31st, saying that the roof of an elderly woman's house damaged by the strong wind of Typhoon No.15 was forcibly repaired. Arrested on suspicion of violation of specific commercial transaction law (intimidation).
According to the announcement, the president conspired with friends, visited the home of a woman in her 70s in Chiba City on September 10, the day after Typhoon No. 15 landed, and said, “The roof tiles must be lifted and repaired.” Suspected of repairing the roof. The woman was charged 250,000 yen and paid on the spot.
In September, the prefectural police arrested a man (27) of the company employee on the same charges. The involvement of the president emerged, and he was nominated and chased whereabouts.
By the 29th, the prefectural police received about 160 damage consultations related to house repairs. The prefectural police are investigating that the company has also been involved.
